transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Vishal this side from IndiaMART office sir how are you? Good evening sir.
Customer: Kaise hai aap?
Executive: Sir bas aapko concern ke liye puch raha tha. Kuch hai toh nahi?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Koi problem toh nahi face kar rahe ho na sir service mein?
Customer: Service mein main meri baar complete kar diya na woh IndiaMART ka Kerala ka lead nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Maine aapko bola tha sir lead available thi jab morning mein aap se baat hui thi. Aapne check kiya tha woh lead ko?
Customer: Aapne check kiya tha sir lead ko?
Customer: Kaunsa lead hai? Sabhi Madhur, Karnataka, Mysore, Mysore, Agartala. Location select kariye sir ek bari Kerala.
Executive: Kerala location select kariye ek baar.
Customer: Woh do din ka pehle ka hai. Ha ek bari consume kijiye office hai office hai.
Executive: Office cube yeh cube cubical hai sir correct?
Customer: Office woh hindi mein bolte hai woh hum log nahi kar raha hai na. Hum log consume kar raha hai na.
Executive: Aap ek bari agar uss product ko dekhoge na niche uski category do selected hai sir. Ek pre fabricated house and second hai house construction service. Yeh in dono se related hai sir. Toh yeh I think aapke liye relevant hoegi sir.
Customer: Yeh kya hai pre fabricated terrace room.
Executive: Kaunsa hai mera phone se lekh raha hai. Mild steel portable house.
Customer: Main wohi aap se keh raha hu. Aapne by lead pe click kiya. Correct?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Uss mein aapko jo lead dikha raha hai dikha raha hai office cubical ki.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yeh do category se linked kar rakha hai sir isko pre fabricated house and house construction service.
Customer: Correct? Isme linked hai?
Executive: Niche niche. Iska jo customer ka jo category select ho rakha hai na sir woh house construction service ka select ho rakha hai niche aap dekhenge toh. Ek bari consume karke dekh lijiye sir dekho lead ke point toh aapke paas hai hi available. Correct?
Customer: Theek hai main consume ho gaya woh teen din ka pehle ka hai.
Executive: Sir main samajh raha hu but ek bari please toh consume kariye shayad yaha se aapko kuch response mil sake sir.
Customer: Theek hai main consume kar diya.
Executive: Theek hai uske niche bhi ek dikha rahi hai sir pre fabricated yeh terrace room ki sir.
Customer: Building nahi hai isme humko nahi dikh raha hai woh last building contract. Kochi ki hai sir Kochi ki.
Executive: Nahi humko dikha raha nahi hai.
Executive: Search kariye ek bari pre fabricated terrace room ke naam se.
Customer: Nahi hai.
Executive: Open kiya aapne search karke dekha?
Customer: Toh hum log nahi kar rahe hai pre fabricated terrace room.
Executive: Nahi kar rahe ho aap? Theek hai. Usse niche hai sir Kerala ki hi yeh mild steel portable house.
Customer: Portable. Haan woh kar rahe hai lekin.
Executive: Kar rahe hai? Haan lekin woh do din pehle ka hai.
Customer: Sir main yeh samajh raha hu do din pehle ki hai. Do din pehle ki aapne consume kar diya consume kar diya.
Executive: Haan ji. Theek hai uske niche bhi portable house ki requirement hai Kerala ki.
Customer: Aap sir meri na by lead ko use karte rahiye. Woh woh woh use kar diya woh use kar diya portable house use kar diya already use kar diya.
Executive: Agar agar aise hi use karte rahoge na sir toh aapki activity IndiaMART pe hum track kar payenge sir aur waha se aapko lead aur inquiry dono receive hoegi sir.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Isi tarike se koi bhi lead aayegi na aap usko consume karega sir. Lead available hai aapko kya hai na aapka naam kya hai aap achcha se baat kar rahe hai kyunki aapka jaise woh aadmi hai na woh main ek staff ko rakha hai aisa karne ke liye. Lekin pura Uttar Pradesh, Bengaluru, Karnataka, Coimbatore aisa aa raha hai. Coimbatore toh humko useful bhi hai. Coimbatore humko use kar sakta hai lekin woh pura yeh Bihar, Uttar Pradesh, Gujarat aisa lead aayega toh hum log kya karega?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Okay. Nahi sir aap aapki activity mera main pehle android phone use karne ke time itna problem nahi tha uss time achcha achcha achcha aaya tha. Lekin abhi aaya nahi hai. Aap aap IndiaMART pe na bas ek cheez pe focus kariye by lead consume karne pe sir. Hum na aapki na activity detect karte hai sir IndiaMART pe kis location ki aap use kar rahe hai aur kaunsi product ki use kar rahe hai. Toh uss pattern ko na hum follow karte hai. Theek hai main aaj aaj hi teen Kerala ka use kar diya koi mere ko fayda nahi hai main use kar diya. Kal aayega nahi aayega dekhega humko. Sir dekho main yeh commit nahi kar sakta hu sir ki kal koi lead aayegi ya nahi aayegi sir. Jab bhi hamare paas aati hai na hum usko system mein float karte hai aur usko ek lead ko maximum paanch saari use kar sakte hai sir. Toh bas aap se main ek cheez pe request karunga jis time pe bhi aapke paas lead aayegi na aap uss recent lead ko jarur consume karega sir. Jo bhi Kerala ki ho sir.
Customer: Correct hai sir?
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Theek hai toh jo concern aaya tha sir main yaha par ek bari close karta hu sir isko theek hai. Baki yeh mera number hai. Aap isko apne paas save rakhiyega sir aur kabhi bhi further koi assistant ki requirement ho na aap mujhe direct call kar sakte hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Sir mere ko ek main ek mail id de sakte hai?
Executive: Vishal.b@indiamart.com sir. Vishal nahi woh customer care ka?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir aap mujhe connect kar sakte hai seedha sir. Yeh meri email id yeh meri email id hai sir. Aapko aap chaho na is number pe call karoge toh seedha direct mere paas hi land hoegi sir.
Customer: Ab whatsapp mein text kar dijiye mail id.
Executive: Not an issue main aapko whatsapp pe text kar deta hu woh mera whatsapp number bhi hoga aap mujhe uss pe bhi connect kar payenge sir. Correct?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur koi requirement?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Kerala leads not showing up.

- Leads from irrelevant locations are showing.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to consume leads.

- Explained about pre-fabricated house category.

- Asked to use by leads to track activity.

- Provided personal contact details for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share email ID on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location, category
